```
autoSaveInterval: 60
batchSize: 128
protocols:
  - http
  - https
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: demo-config
data:
  config.yaml: |
    autoSaveInterval: 60
    batchSize: 128
    protocols:
      - http
      - https
```

```
`kubectl create configmap demo-config --from-file=config.yaml`
configmap "demo-config" created
```

```
`kubectl get configmap/demo-config -o yaml ` `>demo-config.yaml`
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: demo-config
data:
  greeting: Hola
```

```
spec:
  containers:
    - name: demo
      `image``:` `cloudnatived/demo:hello-config-env`
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      `env``:`
        `-` `name``:` `GREETING`
          `valueFrom``:`
            `configMapKeyRef``:`
              `name``:` `demo-config`
              `key``:` `greeting`
```

```
`kubectl apply -f hello-config-env/k8s/`
configmap/demo-config created deployment.apps/demo created
```

```
`kubectl port-forward deploy/demo 9999:8888`
Forwarding from 127.0.0.1:9999 -> 8888 Forwarding from [::1]:9999 -> 8888
```

```
spec:
  containers:
    - name: demo
      image: cloudnatived/demo:hello-config-env
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      `envFrom``:`
      `-` `configMapRef``:`
            `name``:` `demo-config`
```

```
spec:
  containers:
    - name: demo
      image: cloudnatived/demo:hello-config-args
      `args``:`
        `-` `"``-greeting``"`
        `-` `"``$(GREETING)``"`
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      env:
        - name: GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              name: demo-config
              key: greeting
```

```
`kubectl apply -f hello-config-args/k8s/`
configmap/demo-config created deployment.apps/demo created
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: demo-config
data:
  config: |
    greeting: Buongiorno
```

```
greeting: Buongiorno
```

```
spec:
  containers:
    - name: demo
      image: cloudnatived/demo:hello-config-file
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      `volumeMounts``:`
      `-` `mountPath``:` `/config/`
        `name``:` `demo-config-volume`
        `readOnly``:` `true`
  `volumes``:`
  `-` `name``:` `demo-config-volume`
    `configMap``:`
      `name``:` `demo-config`
      `items``:`
      `-` `key``:` `config`
        `path``:` `demo.yaml`
```

```
greeting: Buongiorno
```

```
`kubectl apply -f hello-config-file/k8s/`
configmap/demo-config created deployment.apps/demo created
```

```
`kubectl describe configmap/demo-config`
Name:         demo-config Namespace:    default Labels:       <none> 
Data ==== config: greeting: Buongiorno 
Events:  <none>
```

```
`checksum/config``:` `{``{` `include` `(print` `$.Template.BasePath` `"/configmap.yaml")` `.`
    `|` `sha256sum` `}``}`
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: demo-secret
stringData:
  magicWord: xyzzy
```

```
spec:
  containers:
    - name: demo
      image: cloudnatived/demo:hello-secret-env
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      env:
        - name: MAGIC_WORD
          valueFrom:
            `secretKeyRef``:`
              `name``:` `demo-secret`
              `key``:` `magicWord`
```

```
`kubectl apply -f hello-secret-env/k8s/`
deployment.apps/demo created secret/demo-secret created
```

```
`kubectl port-forward deploy/demo 9999:8888`
Forwarding from 127.0.0.1:9999 -> 8888 Forwarding from [::1]:9999 -> 8888
```

```
spec:
  containers:
    - name: demo
      image: cloudnatived/demo:hello-secret-file
      ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      `volumeMounts``:`
        `-` `name``:` `demo-secret-volume`
          `mountPath``:` `"``/secrets/``"`
          `readOnly``:` `true`
  `volumes``:`
    `-` `name``:` `demo-secret-volume`
      `secret``:`
        `secretName``:` `demo-secret`
```

```
`kubectl describe secret/demo-secret`
Name:         demo-secret Namespace:    default Labels:       <none> Annotations: Type:         Opaque 
Data ==== magicWord:  5 bytes
```

```
`kubectl get secret/demo-secret -o yaml`
apiVersion: v1 data:
  `magicWord: eHl6enk=`
kind: Secret metadata: ... type: Opaque
```

```
`echo "eHl6enk=" | base64 --decode`
xyzzy
```

```
`echo -n xyzzy | base64`
eHl6enk=
```

```
kind: Secret
metadata:
  annotations:
    "helm.sh/resource-policy": keep
```

```
password: foo
```

```
password: `ENC[AES256_GCM,data:p673w==,iv:YY=,aad:UQ=,tag:A=]`
```

```
`age-keygen -o key.txt`
Public key: age1fea...
```

```
`echo "password: secret123" > test.yaml`
`cat test.yaml`
password: secret123
```

```
`sops --age age1fea... --encrypt --in-place test.yaml`
`cat test.yaml`
password: ENC[AES256_GCM,data:6U6tZpn/TCTG,iv:yfO6... ... sops:
 ... age: - recipient: age1fea...
```

```
`SOPS_AGE_KEY_FILE=$(pwd)/key.txt sops --decrypt test.yaml`
password: secret123
```

```
sops:
  kms:
  - created_at: 1441570389.775376
    enc: CiC....Pm1Hm
    arn: arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:656532957310:key/920aff2e...
```
